description: Port of Ralph (Autonomous Agent) to Gemini

userStories.title: Define core Gemini API endpoints & Auth
userStories.description: Map the necessary Gemini CLI commands and ensure authentication matches Ralph's flow.
acceptanceCriteria: Verify 'gemini' command is available
Document how authentication is handled (e.g., .gemini/config or env vars)
Create a 'setup_auth.sh' script if needed or verify current auth works
userStories.notes: Implicitly handled by Gemini CLI setup

userStories.title: Map Ralph's data models
userStories.description: Ensure prd.json and progress tracking matches Ralph's structure exactly.
acceptanceCriteria: prd.json structure matches Ralph's example (DONE)
Implement 'progress.txt' logging in lisa.sh
Implement 'archive/' logic for previous runs in lisa.sh

userStories.title: Implement Gemini-specific data ingestion
userStories.description: Gemini needs explicit context injection unlike Amp.
acceptanceCriteria: Ensure lisa.sh gathers full file tree and content
Optimize context gathering (ignore .git, node_modules, etc.)
Test with large file sets if possible (simulated)

userStories.title: Gemini-centric Analytics & Documentation
userStories.description: Add analytics and documentation specific to Gemini usage.
acceptanceCriteria: Create docs/GEMINI_API.md explaining how Lisa uses Gemini
Add simple token usage tracking if possible (log prompt length)
Ensure performance parity (measure time per iteration)

userStories.title: Rigorous Testing
userStories.description: Run the agent against itself to verify stability.
acceptanceCriteria: Lisa runs through all previous stories autonomously
Lisa updates prd.json correctly
Lisa handles errors gracefully

userStories.title: The Lisa Loop Engine (Hooks & Validation)
userStories.description: Implement a hook system (pre/post/validate) to enhance reliability and match Ralph's 'Stop hook' capabilities.
acceptanceCriteria: Create 'hooks/' directory
Implement 'hooks/validate.sh' for quality gates
Implement 'hooks/stop-hook.sh' for error handling
Update 'lisa.sh' to execute these hooks during the loop

userStories.title: Command Interface & Safety
userStories.description: Enhance CLI interaction with interrupt traps and ad-hoc task support.
acceptanceCriteria: Implement SIGINT trap in lisa.sh to save state
Allow ad-hoc tasks via command line arguments
Implement a 'pause' or 'resume' mechanism

userStories.title: Distribution Prep & Documentation
userStories.description: Prepare the project for public release, mimicking Ralph's documentation and structure.
acceptanceCriteria: Create .gitignore for runtime artifacts
Clean up local artifacts
